original_text:
But the court shall sit in judgment,
    and his dominion shall be taken away,
    to be consumed and destroyed to the end.
korean_text: 그러나 심판이 시작되면 그는 권세를 빼앗기고 완전히 멸망할 것이요

sentences.original_text: But the court shall sit in judgment
and his dominion shall be taken away
to be consumed and destroyed to the end.
